basis: The user explicitly commits to rotating snack options and to engaging with the care team if overwhelmed, showing strong alignment with the plan and proactive planning.
cognitive_dissonance: Moderate: some anxiety about calories exists, but it is balanced by a clear, safety-first approach and willingness to seek support.
negative_thought_patterns: Recurring worry about calorie totals, fear of fullness, tendency toward all-or-nothing thinking about sticking to a plan.
emotional_triggers: Anxiety around intake, desire for control and predictability, concern about burdening self or care team.
coaching_notes: Keep offering small, adaptable choices and simple rotation cues. Provide gentle reminders and encourage care-team involvement as needed. Consider adding optional nudges or prompts if helpful, and validate progress even when adjustments are needed.
